destinations.title: Paris, France
destinations.description: The romantic capital of the world, home to the Eiffel Tower, exquisite art, and charming cafés.

destinations.title: Tokyo, Japan
destinations.description: A buzzing metropolis where cutting-edge technology meets serene temples and cherry blossoms.

destinations.title: Cape Town, South Africa
destinations.description: Spectacular landscapes with Table Mountain, pristine beaches, and vibrant culture.

destinations.title: Sydney, Australia
destinations.description: A coastal city famous for its Opera House, stunning beaches, and laid-back vibe.

destinations.title: New York City, USA
destinations.description: The city that never sleeps, packed with iconic landmarks and a diverse food scene.

destinations.title: Rome, Italy
destinations.description: An eternal city filled with ancient ruins, Renaissance art, and vibrant street life.

destinations.title: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: A tropical paradise known for its beaches, rice terraces, and spiritual heritage.

destinations.title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
destinations.description: A vibrant city famous for its carnival, Sugarloaf Mountain, and Copacabana beach.

destinations.title: Barcelona, Spain
destinations.description: A cultural hotspot renowned for Gaudí's architecture, tapas bars, and sunny beaches.

destinations.title: Dubai, UAE
destinations.description: A futuristic city in the desert, home to the world's tallest building and luxury shopping.
